contentrichtext.text: <onlyinclude>'''[[John Hanson]]''' (1715–1783) was President of the American Continental Congress. </onlyinclude> '''John Hanson''' may also refer to: <onlyinclude>*[[John Hanson (singer)]] (1922–1998), Canadian-born British singer and actor *[[John Hanson (footballer)]] (born 1962), English former footballer *[[John Hanson (New Zealand footballer)]], New Zealand international football (soccer) player *[[John Hanson (Liberia)]] (died c. 1860), Liberian senator associated with American Colonization Society *[[John Hanson (director)]], American film director *[[John Hanson (ESPN Radio)]], Nevada *[[John Fletcher Hanson]] (1840–?), American industrialist *[[John Wesley Hanson]] (1823–1901), American Universalist minister and historian *Sir John Hanson, 3rd Baronet, of the [[Hanson baronets]] *John Hanson (born 1973), British electronic musician in the band [[Magnetophone]] *John Hanson, host of "In Black America", on radio station [[KUT]]</onlyinclude> ==See also== *[[John Hansen (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Hanson, John}}
